This is a darcs archive for the Pure Data Packet project.

To make a local copy of the repositiory do:

  darcs get --partial http://zwizwa.be/darcs/pdp-12
  cd pdp-12
  . bootstrap
  ./configure && make

To get updates later, cd to the pdp-12 directory and do:

  darcs pull -a
  cd pdp-12
  . bootstrap
  ./configure && make
